title: Sale Page Headline Generator
original_prompt: Can you create 5 persuasive headline that captures attention and drives conversions on your sales page about {topic: CICB travel-friendly white noise machine for sleeping}.
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "dimension1": [
            "persuasive headline 1",
            "persuasive headline 2",
            "persuasive headline 3",
            "persuasive headline 4",
            "persuasive headline 5"
        ],
        "dimension2": [
            "CICB travel-friendly white noise machine",
            "sleeping",
            "sales page",
            "attention-grabbing",
            "drives conversions"
        ],
        "dimension3": [
            "focus on benefits",
            "highlight portability",
            "emphasize sleep quality",
            "include urgency",
            "appeal to travelers"
        ]
    }
}
```
